title: Help please!!!
content: I am not able to login to http://library.pesu.edu it says member name or password invalid shouldn't we enter the same details as it was for pesu academy ?

comments.body: You can reach out to the librarian  [librarian@pes.edu](mailto:librarian@pes.edu) stating your issue and mentioning your SRN, previous credentials. He will respond within one working day.
